item.title: Help with timers?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Ok, I am trying to make a teleport delay work for using a spell teleport, but I get this error,
Also, all credits to iamsuperman05, he got me this far, I just don’t understand this error

here is the code,

case 4140: final long TeleportDelay = 0; if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - TeleportDelay) < 3000){ c.sendMessage("Stop trying to spam kid!!!!!!!!!!"); return; }// Credits to iamsuperman05 for the above^^ if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(556, 3) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(563, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554, 1)) { // varrock tele if (c.playerLevel[6] >= 25) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3210, 3424, 0); TeleportDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.getItems().deleteItem2(556, 3); c.getItems().deleteItem2(563, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem2(554, 1); c.sendMessage("You teleport to varrock."); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required level for this spell."); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); c.sendMessage("You need 3 Air Runes, 1 Law Rune, and 1 Fire Rune."); } break;

Read full topic
